definitions.definition: A smooth, chewy, sticky confection made by heating sugar and other ingredients until the sugars polymerize and become sticky.
A (sometimes hardened) piece of this confection.
A yellow - brown color , like that of caramel.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A smooth, chewy, sticky confection made by heating sugar and other ingredients until the sugars polymerize and become sticky.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A (sometimes hardened) piece of this confection.
A yellow - brown color , like that of caramel.
